title: GMB's Charlotte Hawkins snaps at Piers Morgan
text:
Charlotte Hawkins delighted Piers Morgan when she finally snapped at him during a segment on Good Morning Britain on Tuesday.

The 44-year-old told him to 'zip it' when he mocked her for saying there was some 'breaking news' coming up about Brexit.

But when he quizzed her on what that news was, she said she did not yet know, leading the 54-year-old to mock her for not knowing what was what.

This is awkward: It all started when Charlotte announced that viewers would find out the Brexit proposals later in the programme and an amused Piers demanded to know what it was

It all started when Charlotte announced that viewers would find out the Brexit proposals later in the programme.

'Well what are they?' Piers asked.

'We don't know yet,' Charlotte replied, cool as a cucumber.

Telling him: 'We don't know yet,' Charlotte replied, cool as a cucumber as she noted that only the Prime Minister and Arlene Foster know but the news would be coming in

Taking over: 'Well what's the breaking news then? The breaking news is that you don't know what it is,' Piers scoffed

'Well what's the breaking news then? The breaking news is that you don't know what it is,' Piers scoffed.

Charlotte hit back: 'Nobody knows what it is apart from the Prime Minister and Arlene Foster at the moment'

But he mocked: 'It's like taking a camel to an Oasis and saying it can't take a drink. So there's really big breaking news everybody, we just can't tell you what it is.'

Charlotte then delighted Piers by snapping at him. She said: 'I tell you what, there'll be a major incident here in the Good Morning Britain studio in a minute. Zip it!'

He seemed thrilled and said: 'Ooh, finally! I knew underneath that sweet exterior, was a little harridan.'

But Charlotte continued to hit back and said: 'Stop butting in, I am trying to give people breaking news.'
description: Charlotte Hawkins delighted Piers Morgan when she finally snapped at him during a segment on Good Morning Britain on Tuesday.
